text:
e="preserve">Cliff Jackson (3 September 1941 – 22 May 2018) was an English professional footballer. He was born in Swindon, England.
Jackson played as a forward. He made 396 appearances in the Football League for Swindon Town, Plymouth Argyle, Crystal Palace and Torquay United, before moving into non-league football with Cambridge City.
Jackson also appeared for England Schoolboys whilst at Swindon Town.
Personal life.
Jackson died on 22 May 2018, aged 76.
